name: Home Grown (Shane O'Brien)
description:
Controls:
WASD / Up, Left, Down, Right - Move

Space - Jump

CTRL - Plant Ray

Q/E - Change the active character

Summary

You play as a team of plants trying to get home. Each plant has a different ability, they all follow each other until they “Plant” themselves to activate their ability to reach the end of the level.

Gameplay

The goal is to get the plants from the left side of the screen / starting area to the right side of the screen / exit.

The player must navigate puzzles using the special abilities of the plants, such as growing to provide a ladder to climb, knocking obstacles off edges etc

The player must also avoid / neutralize enemies using the same abilities to complete the puzzles. [Note: Enemies did not make it into the game by the deadline, however we plan to expand on the project in the future]
